fullDescription:
Experience the limited access demo of the HAMK always on mobile robotics laboratory and drive a real ESP32 powered robot remotely. No prior robotics or programming knowledge is required. The course is beginner friendly and easy to start.

To enroll, register in the app and join the course group with code JoinHAMK2026. Access for new users is limited to a two week period and this demo stays active throughout December.

The platform uses MicroPython firmware on a robot with motor drivers, encoders, line sensors and LEDs on a chassis that runs on a camera monitored test track. You will learn to script movement, read sensors, stream telemetry, tune PID line following and run remote experiments from anywhere.

We provide a community channel for questions, support and sharing ideas during the course available on Discord
requirements: No previous programming or robotics knowledge is required.
